summary.para: The KERB_INTERACTIVE_LOGON structure contains information about an interactive logon session.
It is used by with the Kerberos security package using LOGON32_PROVIDER_WINNT50 or LOGON32_PROVIDER_DEFAULT.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_LOGON.MessageType
member.summary: value identifying the type of logon request being made. This member must be set to KerbInteractiveLogon.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_LOGON.LogonDomainName
member.summary: specifying the name of the target logon domain.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_LOGON.Password
member.summary: specifying the user password. When you have finished using the password, remove the sensitive information from memory by calling SecureZeroMemory. For more information on protecting the password, see Handling Passwords.
